EnableSyncJob.title: Enable Sync Job for check boleto expired

CronSyncJob.title: Cron expression for processing job execution
CronSyncJob.description:
The value is a regular CRON expression.
To run task every X minutes please use "0/x * * * *".
To run it every X hours at 00 minutes use "0 */X * * *". You can also specify minutes: "15 */x * * *"
To run it every X days at midnight use "0 0 */x * *"
